_sText:
Hi this is a map ive worked on for a couple of weeks on and off and i think it turned out pretty decent.
it's made for both auto and scroll, it's designed to be medium-hard on both but especially hard on scroll.

songs & sounds
-zelda sound
-zelda sound
-zelda - Hyrule Field
-Atmosphere - Yesterday

theres a secret surf room (original surf level creator: monkeydie)
you get to it by noclipping to it (bonus potential) or collecting all 16 alien signs and walking in from the start.

it's very important to put the start zone where the start zone pad/sign is located.

textures;
komakc - textures
keyuu - numbers
dotty - alien decals

EDIT: THIS MAP WILL CRASH BECAUSE I PACKED THE NAV FILE BY ACCIDENT, AFTER YOU UPLOAD MAP TO SERVER REPLACE THE NAV FILE WITH A BLANK NAV FILE IN THE MAPS FOLDER.
if you dont know how, download this https://www.dropbox.com/s/i48eiwk8uta609b/bhop_serze.nav?dl=0 and put it in the map folder on the server.
